title: 581: Visit That Like a Time Period with Dinosaurs
description: How we deal with physical media, the most tech heavy restaurants we've patronized, tech that ended up disappointing us, and the social media networks of yesteryear that we'd bring back.
author: Dan Moren and Mikah Sargent
excerpt: How we deal with physical media, the most tech heavy restaurants we've patronized, tech that ended up disappointing us, and the social media networks of yesteryear that we'd bring back.
